topic.title: Sort comments and posts++?
topic.body:
How to sort by:
New to Old
By points gotten last X hours/days
By most points ever

How to see:
My comment history
My post history

Is it possible to:
Sync users.json with SyncThing between linux and android?
Edit zites other than manually edit files in a text editor?

ty

1578341356_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRF.body:
> [styromaniac](#comment_1623_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): His "muh speech" is questionable. Maybe he's a pedophile.

Guilt by associating with freedom to post anything, as a principle. No good.

> [draugrdeathlord](#comment_258_12BRJSQrTETJVZzt2jHdqPywv3SdugSywC): Go to ZeroMusic literally the first at the top are lynching nigger songs ðŸ˜¢ like muh freedom of speech dude but is there any actual value in keeping those songs in the database ? Why can't the admin just remove them ?

I find some styles of pop music genuinely insulting due to the pure commercial nature and absolute lack of artistic worth and in many ways find them the perpetually, ongoing anthems for the horrors of man in the name of money.

Can we remove them too?

1578439030_1NZftAz9VSawGF5JgMYGFv4ByoKEa.body: I remember buying my first SD card for my MP3 player way back. A big ol' 512mb standard size SD. I marveled at the fact that I could store nearly a full, uncompressed CD on a tiny piece of plastic the size of my thumb.

1578573647_1G9k2b4cSRzZSfLQuzxmpJB3LT3Gf.body:

Oh shit better do what he says, server admin or else the cyber police

1578569304_16dnrZKRMLhQCjv6nxx7tP5KJ2H2P.body: Whats even the point of ultra security when my computer has a 486 hardwaresnitching to NSA?
